title: AdventureWorks2017 Management API ðŸ–¥
description: A FastAPI backend for AW2017MA application. (_for testing purposes_)
## Person endpoints
* **get all persons** (filters, offset and limit params)
* **count all persons** (filters params)
* **get specific person** (person_id required)
* **create new person** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
* **update persons data** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
* **delete person** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
## Phone number type endpoints
* **get all phone number types** (filters, offset and limit params)
* **count all phone number types** (filters params)
* **get specific phone number type** (phone_number_type_id required)
* **create new phone number type** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
* **update phone number types data** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
* **delete phone number type** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
## Person phone endpoints
* **get all person phones** (filters, offset and limit params)
* **count all person phones** (filters params)
* **get specific person phone** (person_id, phone_number, phone_number_type_id required)
* **create new person phone** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
* **update person phones data** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
* **delete person phone** (_readonly users cannot do this!_)
summary: AdventureWorks2017 Management API is a FastAPI Python solution for AW2017 datawarehouse management.
